item.title: Here are more Xbox Game Pass games coming this October
item.content:encoded:
Outer Worlds 2! Football Manager 26! PowerWash Simulator 2!

Microsoft has announced the next batch of games coming to its Xbox Game Pass subscription this month.

It includes the brand-new Outer Worlds 2, which is launching on Game Pass, as well as the squeaky clean sequel PowerWash Simulator 2 and Football Manager 26!

This comes in the wake of a price hike for the subscription service, which has led to the Game Pass Ultimate tier becoming more expensive in the US and UK.

Here are the games coming to Xbox Game Pass this October.

Available Today

  • Commandoes Origins (Cloud, console, and PC) via Game Pass Premium
  • Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 (Cloud, Xbox Series X/S, and PC) via Game Pass Premium

Coming Soon

  • PowerWash Simulator 2 (Cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X/S) – 23rd October via Game Pass Ultimate and PC Game Pass
  • Bounty Star (Cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X/S) – 23rd October via Game Pass Ultimate and PC Game Pass
  • Super Fantasy Kingdom (Game Preview) (PC) – 24th October via Game Pass Ultimate and PC Game Pass
  • Halls of Torment (Cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X/S) – 28th October via Game Pass Ultimate, Game Pass Premium, and PC Game Pass
  • The Outer Worlds 2 (Cloud and Xbox Series X/S) – 29th October via Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass
  • 1000xResist (Cloud, PC, and Xbox Series X/S) – 4th November via Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass, and Game Pass Premium
  • Football Manager 26 (PC) – 4th November via Game Pass Ultimate, and PC Game Pass
  • Football Manager 26 Console (Cloud, Console, and PC) – 4th November via Game Pass Ultimate, PC Game Pass

Lastly, the following games will be leaving the service on 31st October

  • Jusant (Cloud, Console, and PC)
  • Metal Slug Tactics (Cloud, Console, and PC)
  • Return to Monkey Island (Cloud, Console, and PC)

Further details can be found on Xbox Wire. For everything else in Microsoft's subscription service, you can check out our handy Xbox Game Pass guide detailing the many titles available.
